name: Fresh Focaccia
description: Locally baked focaccia bread seasoned with rosemary, served with olive oil and balsamic

name: Caprese Salad
description: Fresh mozzarella , tomatoes, and green basil, seasoned with salt and olive oil

name: Prawn Cocktail
description: Local shelled prawns in a rich cocktail sauce, served in a glass

name: Oyster Rockefeller
description: Oysters topped with a mixture of finely chopped greens, copious amounts of butter and then baked in their shells

name: Lemon Red Snapper
description: Flakey red snapper fresh from the oven, served with melted, herbed butter atop

name: Steak Diane
description: Steak covered in a wonderful sauce flavored with butter, vermouth, garlic, black pepper, mustard, lemon, and Worcestershire sauce
